message: Pain shoots up my back as he climbs on top of me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! What do you think you're doing?!"
With a blank expression, he grabs my arm and twists it.

name: ノイズ
message: "You only need one arm for Rhyme."

name: ノイズ
message: "If you want me to stop, then fight."
My elbow groans as he twists my arm backward.
I don't want to fight him in Rhyme, and I don't want to get Ren involved either.
